item.title: Handlers
item.dc:creator: @iKilem iKilem
item.description:
@iKilem wrote:

CodeForFame:

I really wouldn’t call it a different languages. It’s more of an update to the syntax and libraries.

It may be closely tied with Java, but it’s still a different language. It has its own language specification.

Call it what you want, but at the end of the day, it’s still personal preference.

Read full topic
